I wore this to take my law school graduation pictures. I think the outfit is cute and I am using it again as part of my renaissance fair costume, but the quality is disappointing. The material is pretty thin and the bottom would be completely see through if it didn’t have the multiple layers. The top is slightly see through but not noticeable with a skin toned bra. I do like that the sleeves can be worn on the shoulder or off the shoulder, but they do look a little “bunched” at the top when off the shoulder.  My biggest issue with the product is the material. It cannot be put in the drier and you are only supposed to cool iron it. However the material wrinkles incredibly easily and it is hard to get the wrinkles out unless you have a steamer and lots of time.  Even though it’s thin, I did not feel like the material was breathable, and if the product was any more expensive I would have returned it.

评论概述: Ordered two, one was beautiful, one was a completely different dress
评论详情: First time i ordered i fell in love. Super flattering, you can adjust how tight you want it at the waste and it's not awkward in chest area. Then i ordered a different color in long sleeve and i got a completely different dress that i found ugly :( I see in review photos someone received the same romper and color i ordered as pictured so i assume the seller sent the wrong item by mistake. I ran out of time to return but boy am i tempted to reorder. Very cute. They have good reviews so i assume it's not a common mistake so I'd still recommend it

评论概述: BOUGHT IN 2 COLORS- BREATHABLE AND STYLISH
评论详情: I recently bought the Plustrong Women’s Boho Floral Print Off Shoulder Romper in white and black, and I absolutely love it. Here’s why this romper has become a favorite in my wardrobe:  Pros:  Beautiful Design: The boho floral print is vibrant and stylish, making it a standout piece. The off-shoulder design adds a touch of elegance and flair. Comfortable Fit: The romper is incredibly comfortable to wear. The fabric is soft and breathable, making it perfect for warm weather. Ruffle Hem: The ruffle hem adds a fun and feminine touch, enhancing the overall look of the romper. It drapes beautifully and moves nicely. Versatile: This romper is versatile enough to be dressed up with heels for a night out or kept casual with sandals for a day of errands or a casual outing. Great Color Choices: The white and black combination is classic and chic, making it easy to accessorize and coordinate with other pieces in my wardrobe. Cons:  Size Considerations: Make sure to check the sizing chart carefully, as the fit may vary depending on body type. I found that it fits true to size, but it's always good to confirm before purchasing. Conclusion: The Plustrong Women’s Boho Floral Print Off Shoulder Romper is a fantastic addition to any wardrobe. Its stylish design, comfort, and versatility make it a must-have for anyone who loves boho-chic fashion. The beautiful floral print and ruffle hem make it a standout piece that is sure to turn heads. Highly recommended for its quality and fashionable appeal!
